meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a horseshoe crab.
meanings.sent1: The limuloid shell was hard and spiky.
meanings.sent2: The limuloid creature scuttled along the sandy shore.
meanings.sent3: The limuloid costume at the party was a big hit.
meanings.sent4: Her limuloid behavior in the lab made her stand out among the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The limuloid shape of the spaceship was unlike anything they had ever seen.

meanings.definition: A creature that resembles a horseshoe crab.
meanings.sent1: The limuloid crawled slowly across the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the limuloid to learn more about its habitat.
meanings.sent3: The limuloid in the aquarium seemed to wave at the visitors.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a limuloid in a sea of unfamiliar faces at the conference.
meanings.sent5: The limuloid's movements were graceful and mesmerizing to watch.
